attributes.action: more needs to be done in the system to stop shildren being taken in to care from parents wrongly being accused of child abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop children wrongly taken into care and being forced adopted by parents being wrongly accused of child abuse because of the baby p senoreo more parents are now being wrongly accused of abusing thier children docters and social services need to have more evidance before they remove children from thier parents
